Package com.csd4020.controller

Class Controller.PlayCardListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csd4020.controller.Controller.PlayCardListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    Controller
    class Controller.PlayCardListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Inner class which implements the MouseListener interface in order to allow the user to click on a card of the board and interact with it.
